question: Sallam Allaikum wrt wbr! Dear Mufti Sahab I would like to know if it is allowed to use White Patroleum Jelly (Vaseline)? JazakAllah
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to use white petroleum Jelly if it does not contain any
impure ingredients in it.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
